item.title: 阿达尼事件暴露出 ESG 基金经理仍在坚持 "可怕 "的赌注
item.description: ESG 基金经理再次发现自己站在了市场崩溃的错误一边。【原文：ESG fund managers have once again found themselves on the wrong side of a market meltdown.】

item.title: 安瓦尔担任马来西亚总理两周年之际，婆罗洲挑战迫在眉睫
item.description: 马来西亚最富有的州之一正试图夺取该国最大天然气储备的控制权，使执政联盟的关系复杂化，并有可能对联邦收入造成打击。【原文：One of Malaysia’s wealthiest states is trying to seize control of the nation’s biggest gas reserves, complicating relations in the ruling coalition and threatening a blow to federal revenues.】

item.title: 美国财政部部长贝森特是 "财政鹰派"：华尔街的反应
item.description: 对冲基金主管斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周五被提名为美国财政部长，这让债券投资者得以一窥即将上任的政府的全面经济议程。【原文：Hedge fund chief Scott Bessent’s Friday nomination to become the US Treasury Secretary is offering bond investors a glimpse into the incoming administration’s sweeping economic agenda after an extended search that included multiple prominent contenders.】

item.title: 马斯克因选择火箭发射而非美国证券交易委员会会议躲过制裁
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）翘掉了与美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）的会议，去观看他的一枚火箭发射，法官拒绝对他进行制裁。【原文：A judge declined to sanction Elon Musk for skipping a meeting with the US Securities and Exchange Commission to watch one of his rockets launch.】

item.title: 壳牌-科三合资公司 Raizen 考虑乙醇合作伙伴和出售 Oxxo
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西 Raizen SA 公司正在酝酿出售其第二代乙醇工厂的股份，以筹集现金用于投资，并帮助其主要股东降低债务杠杆。【原文：Brazilian company Raizen SA is mulling the sale of a stake in its second-generation ethanol plants to raise cash for investments and help its main shareholder reduce debt leverage, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普提名对冲基金主管贝森特领导美国财政部
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将提名经营宏观对冲基金 Key Square Group 的斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）担任下一任美国财政部长，为管理他誓言要在第二个任期内颁布的全面经济议程招募一位重要顾问。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump said he is nominating Scott Bessent, who runs macro hedge fund Key Square Group, as the next US Treasury Secretary, enlisting a key adviser to manage the sweeping economic agenda he has vowed to enact in a second term.】

item.title: 莱迪思半导体考虑收购英特尔的 Altera 部门
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，莱迪思半导体公司（Lattice Semiconductor Corp）正在考虑出价收购英特尔公司（Intel Corp.【原文：Lattice Semiconductor Corp. is considering making an offer for all of Intel Corp.’s Altera, people familiar with the matter said, in a twist that could complicate the chip giant’s plans to sell a minority stake in the unit.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼称监管机构不应急于遏制人工智能
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）承认人工智能带来的风险，但她警告说，监管机构也应注意不要限制有用技术的发展。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman acknowledged the risks created by artificial intelligence but warned that regulators should also be careful not to constrict the development of useful technologies.】

item.title: 挪威1.8万亿美元基金首席执行官认为罕见的政治团结是关键
item.description: 挪威首席执行官尼古拉-坦根（Nicolai Tangen）表示，挪威1.8万亿美元的主权财富基金得益于其政治主子之间罕见的共识，这与其他正在探索这一方案的国家不同。【原文：Norway’s $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund benefits from a rare consensus among its political masters, according to Chief Executive Officer Nicolai Tangen, unlike other countries which are exploring such an option.】

item.title: 美国 CLO 销售额接近 1,850 亿美元，超过历史记录
item.description: 今年已发行约 1,847 亿美元由收购贷款支持的债券，自 2018 年以来第三次创下年度发行纪录。【原文：About $184.7 billion of bonds backed by buyout loans have been issued this year, setting an annual issuance record for the third time since 2018.】

item.title: 穆迪首次上调沙特阿拉伯评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司自 2016 年首次对沙特阿拉伯进行评估以来，首次上调了该国的主权评级。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign rating was upgraded by Moody’s Ratings for the first time since the company first assessed the kingdom in 2016.】

item.title: 大选后马斯克的财富达到创纪录的 3480 亿美元
item.description: 受特斯拉公司股票持续上涨以及其人工智能初创公司 xAI 新一轮融资估值达 500 亿美元的推动，埃隆-马斯克的净资产在上周五创下了 3,478 亿美元的历史新高。【原文：Elon Musk’s net worth hit an all-time high of $347.8 billion on Friday, driven by Tesla Inc.’s ongoing stock rally and a new funding round valuing his artificial intelligence startup xAI at $50 billion.】

item.title: 赌徒将数十亿资金投入杠杆市场边缘
item.description: 在久经考验的股票和企业信贷领域，迎接唐纳德-特朗普当选的 "买一切 "狂热正在降温。然而，在华尔街的投机边缘，冒险狂潮却与日俱增。【原文：The buy-everything mania that greeted Donald Trump’s election is cooling in the tried-and-tested world of stocks and corporate credit. Yet on Wall Street’s speculative fringes, the risk-taking frenzy is only getting bigger by the day.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会的处罚和救济创下 82 亿美元的历史记录
item.description: 2024 财年，美国证券交易委员会的罚款和投资者救济创下历史新高。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission’s fines and investor relief hit an all-time record in fiscal 2024.】

item.title: 对冲基金在战争恐慌前削减黄金看涨赌注
item.description: 在俄乌战争爆发提升了黄金的避险吸引力之前，基金经理们对黄金的看涨押注降至近四个月来的最低点。【原文：Money managers’ bullish wagers on gold fell to the lowest in nearly four months before a flare-up in the Russia-Ukraine war boosted its haven appeal.】

item.title: 财政部候选人派系争夺未做出决定的特朗普
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对其财政部长候选人名单的不确定性导致敌对派系再次试图赢得他的青睐。【原文：Presiden-elect Donald Trump’s uncertainty about his slate of Treasury secretary candidates has led to rival factions once again trying to win his favor.】

item.title: 美国债务可持续性被视为金融稳定的首要风险
item.description: 在美联储的一项调查中，美国政府的债务负担目前被视为金融稳定的最大风险，超过了持续的通货膨胀。【原文：The US government’s debt load is now seen as the biggest risk to financial stability, outweighing persistent inflation in a Federal Reserve survey.】

item.title: Altas 和 Leonard Green 准备出售商业屋顶公司 Tecta America
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Tecta America Corp. 的私募股权所有者正在考虑这家商业屋顶公司的战略选择，包括出售。【原文：The private equity owners of Tecta America Corp. are considering strategic options for the commercial roofing company, including a sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会 80 亿美元电话补贴将接受最高法院审查
item.description: 美国最高法院将权衡对联邦行政权力的新一轮攻击，同意审议每年 80 亿美元的补贴是否符合宪法，这些补贴有助于支付穷人和农村居民的电信服务费用。【原文：The US Supreme Court will weigh a fresh line of attack on federal administrative power, agreeing to consider the constitutionality of the $8 billion annual slate of subsidies that help cover the cost of telecom services for poor people and rural residents.】

item.title: 实际上，今年的股票市场很无聊
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 债券市场在 11 月实现七年连涨
item.description: 由于美国总统大选和美联储会议的召开，发行商保持观望，而投资者的强劲需求则推动了价格上涨，市政债券市场将迎来连续第七个 11 月的上涨。【原文：The municipal bond market is headed for its seventh-straight November of gains, with the US presidential election and a Federal Reserve meeting keeping issuers on the sidelines, while strong investor demand has boosted prices.】

item.title: Coatue 校友吉尔罗伊和科技界资深人士拉贾拉姆将创办风险投资公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Coatue Management 的校友 Michael Gilroy 和长期从事技术工作的 Gokul Rajaram 正在组建一家风险投资公司。【原文：Coatue Management alumnus Michael Gilroy and longtime technology executive Gokul Rajaram are forming a venture firm, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷经济在紧缩政策推动下意外萎缩
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在积极推行紧缩政策的同时，努力重启濒临崩溃的经济。【原文：Argentina’s economy unexpectedly shrank in September, as President Javier Milei fights to restart an ailing economy amid an aggressive austerity push.】

item.title: 布里奇沃特听从海妖之歌，男爵却在抵制：ETF IQ
item.description: 欢迎收看 ETF IQ，这是一份专门报道 14 万亿美元全球 ETF 行业的周报。我是彭博新闻社记者兼主播凯蒂-格雷菲尔德（Katie Greifeld）。【原文：Welcome to ETF IQ, a weekly newsletter dedicated to the $14 trillion global ETF industry. I'm Bloomberg News reporter and anchor Katie Greifeld.】

item.title: Polymarket在对预测投注的审查中封杀法国用户
item.description: 基于加密货币的预测市场 Polymarket 已阻止法国用户在该平台上进行新的投注，因为该国的赌博监管机构正在加强审查。【原文：Cryptocurrency-based predictions markets Polymarket has blocked users in France from placing new bets on the platform amid growing scrutiny from the nation’s gambling regulator.】

item.title: 罗宾hood 的加拉格尔退出美国证券交易委员会主席竞选
item.description: 罗宾汉市场公司（Robinhood Markets Inc.【原文：Dan Gallagher, the top lawyer at Robinhood Markets Inc., has removed himself from consideration to lead the US Securities and Exchange Commission under President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 欧洲公司 Permira 进军美国 CLO 市场，发行量激增
item.description: 欧洲收购公司 Permira 将在美国 1 万亿美元的担保贷款义务市场上首次推出交易，交易量接近创纪录的发行量。【原文：European buyout firm Permira is debuting its first deal in the $1 trillion US collateralized loan obligation market, as deals near an issuance record.】

item.title: Ally Financial 考虑出售信用卡业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Ally Financial Inc. 正在探索出售其信用卡部门，三年前，该公司曾通过收购重新涉足信用卡业务。【原文：Ally Financial Inc. is exploring a sale of its credit card arm, according to people familiar with the matter, after getting back into that business through an acquisition three years ago.】

item.title: 解释哈佛捐赠基金的兴衰
item.description:
为什么明星大学基金可能会失去王冠？【原文：

Why a star university fund might lose its crown.

】

item.title: 美联储宣布即将进行的框架审查的细节和重点
item.description: 美联储周五公布了即将进行的框架审查的更多细节，其中包括对央行沟通工具的特别关注。【原文：The Federal Reserve announced more details about its upcoming framework review Friday, including a specific focus on the central bank’s communication tools.】
